profile.name: Rafail Tasakis
profile.bioHtml:
Entrepreneur with global experience, blending scientific with business skills. Trained as a bioinformatics scientist with a PhD in cancer biology, I later transitioned into cross-functional roles within startup ecosystems with founder-like responsibilities, spanning consulting, product and business development, and fundraising strategy. Having a strong and expanding global network, I am currently pursuing an Executive MBA while working as an independent consultant supporting innovators and investors at the intersection of life sciences and deep tech.


My mission is to bring bold innovation faster to where it is most needed. Having a global mindset and the ambition to make a tangible impact, I maintain a high-ownership and responsible attitude both personally and professionally.
